Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Cermak
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 16th, Central Park, Ogden and Pulaski due to, police activity near Pulaski/Cermak.
